text:
Linden Lab / Second Life | Senior Web Application Engineer | San Francisco, Seattle, Boston, Charlottesville, Atlanta, Remote, CA

Linden Lab is looking for innovative web engineers to deliver compelling, responsive web experiences that enrich Second Life. If youâ€™re passionate about the latest web technologies and would be psyched to wake up every morning knowing that your efforts will enhance the largest, most successful virtual world on the Internet then we want to hear from you!

Email me at callum@lindenlab.com and I'll help push your application to the right person.
